# Rivals Workshop Guide

Welcome to the Rivals Workshop Guide. This is an attempt to collect and curate the community's wisdom to make the modding journey less overwhelming.

If this guide does its job, it should take you from any skill level to as far as your time and work ethic will bring you, help you find whatever information you need, and stop you from falling into common traps along the way.

  • Programming Guide teaches programming and language features.
  • Art Guide covers the theory behind making good Rivals art and animations.


Much more is planned, including:

  • Programming Reference Documents
    Will make all Rivals, Gml, or Assistant functions, variables, scripts, error messages, etc, searchable.
  • Quickstart gets new modders set up and able to explore.
  • The Journey will walk modders through the process of building a character at a high level.

When this guide isn't answering your question, try How to Learn.

Propose changes in github (opens new window)
